'''Requires Appropriate Rest''' is [[Sigewinne]]'s [[1st Ascension Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Sigewinne must have at least '''65,000''' Max HP to grant the maximum Elemental Skill DMG increase.
** The Elemental Skill DMG increase from the passive is linear to Sigewinne's Max HP and not stepwise at every 1,000 points of Max HP, meaning the Elemental Skill Gain is equal to 8% of her Max HP above 30,000, until the maximum increase is reached.
